effect.black-white: This Pokémon cannot be burned. If a Pokémon is burned and acquires this ability, its burn is healed; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle.
effect.black-2-white-2: This Pokémon cannot be burned. If a Pokémon is burned and acquires this ability, its burn is healed; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle.

flavor_text.black-white: Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.
